english.segment1: Here I am waiting for You, Here I am reaching out to You, I will run into Your arms again, And Im longing for Your touch once again,
english.segment2: Take my life, everything, All I am, An offering for you, Cause youre all Im living for
english.segment3: Here I am waiting on You, Here I am reaching out for You, I will run into Your arms again, And Im longing for Your touch once again,
english.segment4: [Chorus]. Take my life, everything, All I am, An offering for you, Cause youre all Im living for. Take my heart, all of me, Im laying it down, to worship You my God. Cause Youre all Im living for,
english.segment5: I will run into Your open arms, To your love, that washes away my fears. I am found, deep in this mystery, Cause Youre all Im living for
english.segment7: Cause Youre all, Youre All Im living for, Jesus Youre all, All Im living for.
